verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [V: blamed] [ARG1: yet another entity] [ARG2: for the growing immigration crisis on the U.S. southern border] : [C-ARG1: the news media] .
President Trump on Tuesday blamed yet another entity for the [V: growing] [ARG1: immigration crisis] on the U.S. southern border : the news media .
